message: I propose we split the money with an 80/20 ratio in my favor. This takes into account the inflation factor.
I'll give you 40, but I think I deserve more considering the inflation factor is not as extreme as you claim.
Considering the inflation, I propose we divide the money with a 72/28 ratio in my favor. This reflects the decrease in value of our currency.
I'm willing to compromise and give you an equal split, but I'm not sure if it's a good idea to give you the majority share considering the inflation is still affecting you more.
